intro.description: Let's run the count model. The model logic is separate from the execution logic. Execution logic is saved in run configurations, which are accessible through the Run menu.

item.title: Run count
item.description:
Open the Run configurtion dialog, and select the count configuration. You will see a slew of options, including which models to run, what instruments to attach, etc.
Select count and run it. You should see the output in the model log viewer.
